Reviews.Title: BEST EVER PIONEER 150FD-PRO "KURO"
Reviews.Author: David P. Biasco Jr.
Reviews.Content: Pioneer Elite Pro-150FD 60' Plasma HDTV Pioneer Electronics announced a mandate to reengineer its plasma technology "from the ground up." The result is a new series of plasma display panels that the company has dubbed "Kuro," which is the Japanese word for "black." An HDTV that produces deeper, darker blacks offers better contrast and a more colorful picture than those that cannot, and the 60-inch Pioneer Elite KURO PRO-150FD delivers black levels like no other set I've seen. In addition, the PRO-150FD's new video processor is the best I've seen for all HD sources; it minimizes distracting artifacts without sacrificing detail. If you're looking for the most pleasing plasma you can buy, and you can afford the steep $7,500 price, the PRO-150FD fills the bill and thus it earns our Editors' Choice award.
